subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal’s straight-set victory over Jo-Wilfried Tsonga in the Monte Carlo Masters set up a final with Novak Djokovic, who defeated Fabio Fognini.
snippet: Rafael Nadal’s straight-set victory over Jo-Wilfried Tsonga in the Monte Carlo Masters set up a final with Novak Djokovic, who defeated Fabio Fognini.
